nodes.text: Veltnor was the name of an Imperial convoy group, which carried basic supplies and military hardware bound for the Imperial task force orbiting Hoth. The convoy itself consisted of eight MB-C1 medium transports, two Modular Conveyors and two Container Transports
Despite being escorted by the Strike-class medium cruiser Scythe and its TIE/LN starfighters, the convoy was completely destroyed by a Rebel Alliance attack shortly after the Battle of Hoth.
